room_title: Escape room "The Grimm Escape" by Puzzle Break in Boston
review: Super fun with very challenging puzzles! My friend and I did the Grimm Room which is the hardest and it was too much for just the two of us.

room_title: Escape room "The Grimm Escape" by Puzzle Break in Boston
review: Went as a big group for our college outing. Iâ€™ve never been to one of these before and it took my breath away! It was so much fun and so unique. We had to escape a mystical forest and it was a blast. Would totally go again.

room_title: Escape room "The Grimm Escape" by Puzzle Break in Boston
review: In my first puzzle room adventure today, our 4 person group had a blast! Carly was great at guiding as needed. We escaped Grimm's Forest with 2 seconds to spare. Will definitely go back to try the other two rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Grimm Escape" by Puzzle Break in Boston
review: David and Tam were awesome! The Grimm Escape was incredible. With just 12 seconds to spare we were able to get out! We will be back to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Grimm Escape" by Puzzle Break in Boston
review: Yesterday my husband, a couple friends and I all got to experience this interactive mind twisting game! We did The Grimm Escape which was the hardest puzzle. A twist on old school fairy tales! There are a lot of moving parts to this puzzle to solve including two different rooms with tons of clues scattered everywhere! With some helpful clues given to us by David and Tam, we managed to escape with seconds to spare! Thanks again Puzzle Break!
